actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To require Congressional approval for implementation of a severity-adjusted inpatient prospective payment system for rural hospitals under the Medicare Program.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Requires congressional approval for implementation of a severity-adjusted inpatient prospective payment system (PPS) for rural hospitals under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: To require Congressional approval for implementation of a severity-adjusted inpatient prospective payment system for rural hospitals under the Medicare Program.
